input.sentences: dad and the kids had a fun outing today . a roller coaster started the day off for dad .
the kids decided fly airplanes . the kiddie land was a big hit .
the classic carousel was a nice touch of nostalgia .
one of our favorite parts is when we rode past the petting zoo .
the last part of the adventure was relaxing for all . a calm boat ride on a small stream .
output.sentences: Valley Fair has a lot of rides.
There are a lof of rides for young kids.
Some kids don't like to go on fast rides.
Some kids don't like to go on rides at all.
There are also fun rides for teens and adults there.
